attributes.additional_details: Because our educational system is outdated and students are struggling everyday and we need the government to follow suit like Finland because students are learning about stuff that isn’t relevant in the modern day world
attributes.background: I want them to update the school system and make it more relevant to what our work is today and help our student become more mentally stable

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to change the education system to make it more relevant, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
